forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As the first light of dawn approaches in Downtown San Francisco, the air is wrapped in a gentle embrace of coolness, with overnight clouds gradually giving way to the bright promise of the day ahead. A soothing whisper of wind from the west southwest carries the scent of the ocean, hinting at the refreshment that the sun will soon bestow upon the city. The high temperature will peak comfortably in the mid-sixties, allowing for pleasant outdoor exploration. 

Currently, the cityscape might appear shrouded in a thin veil of mist, but as the sun rises higher, it is anticipated that the fog will recede, revealing the stunning contours and vibrant colors of San Francisco’s hilly topography. Outfits that meld comfort with a touch of warmth—perhaps a light jacket layered over a casual shirt—will be ideal as the day transitions. The essence of a San Francisco morning invites leisurely coffee strolls by the waterfront or serene moments spent in one of the local parks, where the lush greenery contrasts beautifully with the awakening sky. With the calming hum of the city stirring to life, it’s a perfect opportunity to embrace the simple joys of a day that promises clarity and warmth.
